snippet: The Day: There was every reason to assume Cathy Watkins would spend most of her life, if not all of it, in prison. But now federal investigators say she was innocent of a 1995 killing.
abstract: The Day: There was every reason to assume Cathy Watkins would spend most of her life, if not all of it, in prison. But now federal investigators say she was innocent of a 1995 killing.

headline.main: A Proclamation of Innocence for a Prisoner Who Never Gave Up
